name: NestedPrinter
comment:
A more advanced printer that keeps track of offset locations to record source maps, but additionally allows nesting of different kind of items, including source_maps/source_maps-printer.NestedPrinters, and it let's you automatically indent text.

This class is especially useful when doing code generation, where different peices of the code are generated independently on separate printers, and are finally put together in the end.

indent.name: indent
indent.comment: Current indentation, which can be updated from outside this class.

printer.name: printer
printer.comment: source_maps/source_maps-printer.Printer used during the last call to source_maps/source_maps.NestedPrinter.build, if any.

map.name: map
map.comment: Returns the source-map information produced after calling source_maps/source_maps-printer.NestedPrinter.build.

add.name: add
add.comment:
Adds source_maps/source_maps-printer.NestedPrinter.add.object to this printer. source_maps/source_maps-printer.NestedPrinter.add.object can be a dart-core.String, source_maps/source_maps-printer.NestedPrinter, or anything implementing source_maps/source_maps-printer.NestedItem. If source_maps/source_maps-printer.NestedPrinter.add.object is a dart-core.String, the value is appended directly, without doing any formatting changes. If you wish to add a line of code with automatic indentation, use source_maps/source_maps-printer.NestedPrinter.addLine instead. source_maps/source_maps-printer.NestedPrinters and source_maps/source_maps-printer.NestedItems are not processed until source_maps/source_maps-printer.NestedPrinter.build gets called later on. We ensure that source_maps/source_maps-printer.NestedPrinter.build emits every object in the order that they were added to this printer.

The source_maps/source_maps-printer.NestedPrinter.add.location and source_maps/source_maps-printer.NestedPrinter.add.span parameters indicate the corresponding source map location of source_maps/source_maps-printer.NestedPrinter.add.object in the original input. Only one, source_maps/source_maps-printer.NestedPrinter.add.location or source_maps/source_maps-printer.NestedPrinter.add.span, should be provided at a time.

Indicate source_maps/source_maps-printer.NestedPrinter.add.isOriginal when source_maps/source_maps-printer.NestedPrinter.add.object is copied directly from the user code. Setting source_maps/source_maps-printer.NestedPrinter.add.isOriginal will make this printer propagate source map locations on every line-break.

addLine.name: addLine
addLine.comment:
Add a source_maps/source_maps-printer.NestedPrinter.addLine.line, autoindenting to the current value of source_maps/source_maps-printer.NestedPrinter.indent. Note, indentation is not inferred from the contents added to this printer. If a line starts or ends an indentation block, you need to also update source_maps/source_maps-printer.NestedPrinter.indent accordingly. Also, indentation is not adapted for nested printers. If you add a source_maps/source_maps-printer.NestedPrinter to this printer, its indentation is set separately and will not include any the indentation set here.

The source_maps/source_maps-printer.NestedPrinter.addLine.location and source_maps/source_maps-printer.NestedPrinter.addLine.span parameters indicate the corresponding source map location of object in the original input. Only one, source_maps/source_maps-printer.NestedPrinter.addLine.location or source_maps/source_maps-printer.NestedPrinter.addLine.span, should be provided at a time.

build.name: build
build.comment: Builds the output of this printer and source map information. After calling this function, you can use source_maps/source_maps-printer.NestedPrinter.text and source_maps/source_maps-printer.NestedPrinter.map to retrieve the geenrated code and source map information, respectively.

toString.name: toString
toString.comment: Returns a string representation of all the contents appended to this printer, including source map location tokens.

hashCode.name: hashCode
hashCode.comment:
Get a hash code for this object.

All objects have hash codes. Hash codes are guaranteed to be the same for objects that are equal when compared using the equality operator ==. Other than that there are no guarantees about the hash codes. They will not be consistent between runs and there are no distribution guarantees.

If a subclass overrides source_maps/source_maps-printer.NestedPrinter.hashCode it should override the equality operator as well to maintain consistency.

runtimeType.name: runtimeType
runtimeType.comment: A representation of the runtime type of the object.

==.comment:
The equality operator.

The default behavior for all dart-core.Objects is to return true if and only if this and source_maps/source_maps-printer.NestedPrinter.==.other are the same object.

Override this method to specify a different equality relation on a class. The overriding method must still be an equivalence relation. That is, it must be:

  • Total: It must return a boolean for all arguments. It should never throw or return null.

  • Reflexive: For all objects o, o == o must be true.

  • Symmetric: For all objects o1 and o2, o1 == o2 and o2 == o1 must either both be true, or both be false.

  • Transitive: For all objects o1, o2, and o3, if o1 == o2 and o2 == o3 are true, then o1 == o3 must be true.

The method should also be consistent over time, so equality of two objects should not change over time, or at least only change if one of the objects was modified.

If a subclass overrides the equality operator it should override the source_maps/source_maps-printer.NestedPrinter.hashCode method as well to maintain consistency.

noSuchMethod.name: noSuchMethod
noSuchMethod.comment:
source_maps/source_maps-printer.NestedPrinter.noSuchMethod is invoked when users invoke a non-existent method on an object. The name of the method and the arguments of the invocation are passed to source_maps/source_maps-printer.NestedPrinter.noSuchMethod in an dart-core.Invocation. If source_maps/source_maps-printer.NestedPrinter.noSuchMethod returns a value, that value becomes the result of the original invocation.

The default behavior of source_maps/source_maps-printer.NestedPrinter.noSuchMethod is to throw a dart-core.NoSuchMethodError.

toString.name: toString
toString.comment: Returns a string representation of this object.

writeTo.name: writeTo
writeTo.comment: Write the contents of this item into source_maps/source_maps-printer.NestedPrinter.writeTo.printer.
